title: Add Rajat's Equation logo to Hero section

requirements.text: Generate the Rajat's Equation logo image from the uploaded file (rajat's eqn logo -1.jpeg) and save it to frontend/public/assets/generated/ as a static asset with appropriate dimensions for Hero section display (approximately 200-250px wide for desktop, responsive scaling for mobile)

quotes: add this logo whithout any fail with proper presentation

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image file is generated from the uploaded logo and saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/
Logo displays the mathematical square root symbol (√) elegantly integrated into the 'R' as shown in the original design
Logo maintains the dark navy blue color and serif typography from the original design
Logo file is optimized for web display with appropriate file size and resolution

requirements.text: Update the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx) to display the generated Rajat's Equation logo image at the top of the Hero section, positioned prominently above or alongside the headline, with proper sizing (200-250px wide on desktop) and responsive behavior for mobile devices

quotes: don't change anything else just place the logo

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is rendered in the Hero component using the static asset path from frontend/public/assets/generated/
Logo is positioned at the top of the Hero section with proper spacing and alignment
Logo scales responsively across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Logo maintains visual clarity and proper aspect ratio at all screen sizes
No other Hero section content is modified except for logo placement

constraints: Do not modify any components other than the Hero component
Keep all existing Hero section content (headline, description, CTA buttons, PWA install prompt, decorative banner) unchanged
Do not alter the Footer, Services, EnrollmentCTA, or any other components
Maintain the existing dark navy blue brand color and warm earth tone palette
nonGoals: Changing brand name or typography throughout the application
Modifying logo placement in Footer or other sections
Altering existing Hero component functionality or interactive elements
Redesigning the overall Hero section layout or structure

required: Professional Rajat's Equation logo featuring a mathematical square root symbol (√) elegantly integrated into the letter 'R', with 'THE' in serif typography above and 'RAJAT'S EQUATION' in clean serif typography below, using dark navy blue color on light cream background (rajats-equation-logo.dim_250x200.png)
